turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like to order a pizza from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure,! just one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah one or Excuse me, actually looks good. Three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: three medium, pizzas, sure! what kind of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All three pizzas should have thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thin crust, noted! alright, what would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can we get two beef barbecues and one pineapple mushroom?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, 3 medium think crust pizzas, the first 2 with Beef BBQ, and lastly a pineapple mushroom pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that'll be correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright! anything else you'd like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just confirmed that they're all thin thin crust and that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, all three have thin crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. That is it for the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, give me a moment to grab the total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for your pizzas will be $38.44.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! give me one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order is in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, perfect. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a great day!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: goodbye.
